subject: Request Product
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team

I hope this message finds you well.

I am currently preparing a video feature about your product for my audience in Switzerland. As part of this project, I would like to purchase your product.

To support this initiative, I would kindly like to ask if you could provide a 20% discount voucher for the purchase. The video will highlight the product’s features and benefits, and I will make sure to credit your brand appropriately.

Please let me know if this would be possible.

Thank you very much for your time and consideration. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Almir Hismani

conversations.body_text: Hi,     You can use this 15% discount first: SN15   We can apply up to 20% off for you after your video is posted.
